mapper.select: SELECT * FROM insurance_product ORDER BY p_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO insurance_product (title, badge, subtitle, descriptions, breadcrumb, main_button_text, top_image, tabs_json, sections_json, bottom_buttons_json) VALUES (#{title}, #{badge}, #{subtitle}, #{descriptions}, #{breadcrumb}, #{main_button_text}, #{top_image}, #{tabs_json}, #{sections_json}, #{bottom_buttons_json})
mapper.update: UPDATE insurance_product SET title = #{title}, badge = #{badge}, subtitle = #{subtitle}, descriptions = #{descriptions}, breadcrumb = #{breadcrumb}, main_button_text = #{main_button_text}, top_image = #{top_image}, tabs_json = #{tabs_json}, sections_json = #{sections_json}, bottom_buttons_json = #{bottom_buttons_json} WHERE p_id = #{p_id}
